title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(mapmatchr) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Define base configuration for using the FMM map matching algorithm — fmm_base_config
title: Define base configuration for using the FMM map matching algorithm — fmm_base_config
text: Define base configuration using FMM map matching algorithm

title: Define base configuration for using the FMM map matching algorithm — fmm_base_config
code: fmm_base_config(   ubodt,   output,   output_fields = "all",   log_level = 2L,   use_omp = FALSE,   step = 100L )

title: Define base configuration for using the FMM map matching algorithm — fmm_base_config
text: ubodt Ubodt file name. output Output file name. output_fields Output fields name, one (opath, cpath, tpath, ogeom, mgeom, pgeom, offset, error, spdist, tp, ep, ). log_level Log level (default: 2 (infor)), 0-trace, 1-debug, 2-info, 3-warn, 4-err, 5-critical, 6-. use_omp specified, run map matching multiple threads. step Number trajectories report progress map matching.

title: Define base configuration for using the FMM map matching algorithm — fmm_base_config
text: configuration object.

title: Set GPS parameters — set_gps_params
text: Set GPS parameters

title: Set GPS parameters — set_gps_params
code: set_gps_params(   config,   file,   id = "id",   geom = "geom",   gps_point = FALSE,   x = "x",   y = "y",   timestamp = "timestamp" )

title: Set GPS parameters — set_gps_params
text: config configuration object. file GPS file name. id GPS id column name. geom GPS geometry column name. applies GPS trajectory CSV file. gps_point specified read input data GPS point, otherwise read input data trajectory. x GPS x column name. applies GPS point CSV file. y GPS y column name. applies GPS point CSV file. timestamp GPS timestamp column name.

title: Set GPS parameters — set_gps_params
text: list.

title: Set map matching parameters — set_map_match_params
text: Set map matching parameters

title: Set map matching parameters — set_map_match_params
code: set_map_match_params(   config,   candidates = 8L,   radius = 300,   error = 50,   factor = 1.5,   vmax = 30 )

title: Set map matching parameters — set_map_match_params
text: config configuration object. candidates Number candidates. radius Search radius (unit: map unit). error GPS sensor error (unit: map unit). factor Scale factor limit shortest path search. applicable stmatch. vmax Maximum vehicle speed (unit: map unit). applicable stmatch.

title: Set map matching parameters — set_map_match_params
text: list

title: Set network parameters — set_network_params
text: Set network parameters

title: Set network parameters — set_network_params
code: set_network_params(   config,   file,   id = "id",   source = "source",   target = "target",   mode = "drive" )

title: Set network parameters — set_network_params
text: config configuration object. file Network file name. id Network id column name. source Network source column name. target Network target column name. mode Network mode name. applies OpenStreetMap (OSM) network. Allowed values one drive|walk|bike|.

title: Set network parameters — set_network_params
text: list.

text: output Output file name. output_fields Output fields name, one (opath, cpath, tpath, ogeom, mgeom, pgeom, offset, error, spdist, tp, ep, ). log_level Log level (default: 2 (infor)), 0-trace, 1-debug, 2-info, 3-warn, 4-err, 5-critical, 6-. use_omp specified, run map matching multiple threads. step Number trajectories report progress map matching.

what: Define base configuration for precomputing an UBODT table — ubodt_base_config
title: Define base configuration for precomputing an UBODT table — ubodt_base_config
text: Define base configuration precomputing UBODT table

title: Define base configuration for precomputing an UBODT table — ubodt_base_config
Define base configuration for precomputing an UBODT table — ubodt_base_config
text: output Output file name. delta Upper distance routing (default: 3000, unit: map unit). log_level Log level (default: 2 (infor)), 0-trace, 1-debug, 2-info, 3-warn, 4-err, 5-critical, 6-. use_omp specified, run multiple threads, faster.

title: Define base configuration for precomputing an UBODT table — ubodt_base_config
text: configuration object.
